remarks:
Equality of restricted functions is determined by their values. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.)  (Prove shortened by AV, 4-Mar-2019.) 

---

 Equality of restricted functions is determined by their values. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-1994.)
statement:
fvreseq $p |- ( ( ( F Fn A /\ G Fn A ) /\ B C_ A ) -> ( ( F |` B ) = ( G |` B ) <-> A. x e. B ( F ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
